body: Icons of the Nation's Capital   Each year, millions of people visit the National Mall and Memorial Parks to recreate, to commemorate presidential legacies, to honor our nation's veterans, to make their voices heard, and to celebrate our nation's commitment to freedom and equality. Read More               Plan Your Visit   Plan Your Visit        Celebrating 100 years on the Mall   National Mall and Memorial Parks Centennial Celebration Events
title: National Mall and Memorial Parks: Park Home
